articles.title: Woman killed by ICE agent in Minneapolis was a mother of 3, poet and new to the city
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The woman shot and killed by a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer in Minneapolis on Wednesday was Renee Nicole Macklin Good, a 37-year-old mother of three who had recently moved to Minnesota.
